product.name: PHI VILLA Cantilever Patio Umbrella Base Weight 4 PCS, HDPE Heavy Duty Square Design, 317 lbs Filled Weight, Offset Patio Umbrella Stand for Poolside Backyard, Black
product.description:
Sunshine, fresh air, blooming flowers and the laughter of loved ones, are the inspirations behind Phi Villa.
For the past 21 years, Phi Villa has been pursuing the most suitable "comfort aesthetics" for each family. Beyond visual appeal, we focus on user centered product design to enhance comfort and create more beautiful moments.
Phi Villa will continue to advocate comfort centered Home living and provide a more enjoyable outdoor experience!
Cantilever Umbrella Base
Cantilever Umbrella Base
Patio Umbrella Base
Patio Umbrella Base
Patio Umbrella Base
product.bullet_points:
• Superior Quality: Crafted from high-quality HDPE material, this heavy-duty base offers exceptional weather and sun protection for your outdoor area
• Generous Capacity: Easily fill with wet sand to achieve a sturdy weight of 317 pounds (144 kg) for maximum stability
• Effortless Usage: Enjoy quick and hassle-free filling with the specially designed spout, making setup a breeze
• Compatible Design: Fits all freestanding umbrellas with weighted cross bases
• Each plate measures L19.7" x W19.7" x H3.9". Weights:4.7 LBS, Max capacity: 79 lbs of wet sand for each piece
